patterns: I'd like to get a diagnosis
responses: I'll need to know your symptoms in order to diagnose you. You can ask for a new diagnosis at any time.

Ibuprofen and Tylenol can relieve general body aches and pain. Make sure to get some pre-emptive rest as this could be an early symptom of another illness.

patterns: What should I do when I have a the chickenpox?
responses: A cool bath with a small amount of baking soda can relive itchiness. Putting calamine lotion on the raash can also relive itchiness. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat the chickenpox, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for chickenpox
responses: Benadryl and other Antihistamines can be used to relive itching. Medecines like Tylenol and Advil can help relive fever, aches, and headaches.

patterns: What should I do when I have cold sores
responses: Use lip balm to prevent your lips from drying out. A cold compress can be used to reduce redness and remove any crusting. A warm compress can be used to relive pain. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat strep throat, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for cold sores
responses: You may have a light fever if this is your first time having a cold sore. In that case common pain relievers like Tylenol, Advil, and Ibuprofen can help relieve any pain caused by the fever. Creams with lidocaine or benzocaine can also offer some pain relief when applied to the sore.

Tea and honey as well as cough drops can help relive some of the coughing. An air humidifier or a steamy shower can also help. This should be ovbious but avoid smoking anything. If the cough gets worse or persists visit your doctor.

patterns: What should I do if I have covid?
responses: Honey, cold soft foods like icecream, and warm beverages can help relive coughing. If you have shortness of breath take long slow breaths. Avoid irritants like smoke, alcohol , and acidic foods. As always drink plenty of fluids and get lots of rest. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat strep throat, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for covid
responses: Advil, Tylenol, and Ibuprofen can be used to relive aches and headaches caused by the fever. If you're a high risk individual visit your doctor and ask about some of the antiviral medication for covid.
Make sure to drink water as a common cause for headaches is dehydration. Ibuprofen and Tylenol can be taken to relieve some of the pain.

patterns: What should I do when I have a cold?
How do you treat a cold?
responses: Make sure to drink lots of liquids to avoid dehydration. Avoid coffee, alcohol, and nicotine. If your fever persists for more than 3 days, visit a doctor. If you have a sore throat, tea and honey or gargling salt water can help relive it. Rest, exerting yourself can make the cold much worse than it already is. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat the common cold, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for the cold?
What medicine to treat a cold?
responses: Any cold medicine you have should work. Tylenol or Advil can be used to relieve aches if you have any. Avoid antibiotics; they don't work on a virus like the common cold.

patterns: What should I do when I have a migraine?
How should I treat a migraine?
How can I treat a migraine?
responses: A migraine can increase sensitivity to bright lights and loud noises. Relax in a dark, quiet room and sleep if you can. Applying a hot or cold compress to the head or neck can often help relieve the pain. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat a migraine, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for a migraine?
What medicine to take for migraine?
responses: If you have a migraine try taking a Tylenol or Advil. It should relive your headache. If your migraine persists for extended periods of time and after taking medicine, see a doctor.

patterns: What should I do when I have pink eye?
What should I do when I have conjunctivitis?
responses: Pink eye can be caused by allergies, a bacterial infection, or a viral infection. If your pink eye is caused by an allergy, removing the allergen from your enviroment can relive symptoms. In the case of bacterial and viral pink eye, it's advised you see your doctor as a perscription can aid the recovery process greatly. In all cases a cold cloth can be used to clean your eye of any discharge. If you're infected in both eyes use a seperate cloth for each eye. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat the pink eye, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for pink eye?
What medicine should I take for conjunctivitis?
responses: Perscribed antibiotics are the most effective medicines for bacterial and viral pink eye. If your pink eye is caused by allergies, allergy medication should suffice.

patterns: What should I do when I have the stomach flu?
How should I treat a stomach flue?
responses: Try to avoid solid foods. If you're hungry try to eat easier to digest foods like bananas, toast, soup, etc. Avoid coffee, nicotine, fatty foods, and alcohol. Make sure to get plenty of rest as well. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat a stomach flu, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for a stomach flu?
responses: If you have a stomach flue try taking Imodium or Pepto-Bismol. They should relive some stomach pain.

patterns: What should I do if I have strep throat?
responses: Gargling with salt water, a humidifier, honey, and cold soft foods such as icecream or yogurt can help relive throat pain. Stay away from anything that could irritate your throat such as smoke and acidic foods. If you want to know what medecine can be used to treat strep throat, just ask.

patterns: What medicine should I take for strep thraot
responses: The standard pain relievers such as Advil, Tylenol, and Ibuprofen can help relive much of the pain strep throat causes. Strep throat can also be cured much quicker with the use of perscribed antibiotics such as penicillin or amoxicillin. Only consider antibiotics if your case of strep throat lasts for longer than usual or becomes worse.
